description:
Add Call Forwarding for AI Voice Agent Escalation

Implement call forwarding functionality that transfers calls from the AI voice agent to a human operator when specific conditions are met.

Requirements:
- Detect when the AI voice agent encounters confusion (e.g., low confidence scores, repeated clarification attempts, unrecognized intents)
- Recognize explicit user requests to speak with a human (phrases like "I want to talk to a person", "human agent", "representative", etc.)
- Trigger call transfer to appropriate human operator or queue
- Maintain call context and conversation history during transfer
- Provide smooth handoff experience with appropriate messaging to the user
- Configure forwarding destination (phone number, operator queue, or department)
- Log all escalation events with reason codes for analytics

Edge cases to consider:
- Handle scenarios when no human operators are available
- Set maximum wait time before forwarding
- Define fallback behavior if forwarding fails
- Consider business hours and after-hours routing
title: Add AI voice escalation to human operator
